scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Crucifixion of Christ, with Jesus on the cross, his body pierced by a spear. Above him, a bust of God the Father is visible within a blue mandorla. Below the cross, a group of figures are gathered. To the left, a woman in a red robe and green sash, likely the Virgin Mary, is being comforted by another figure. To the right of the cross, soldiers are present, one of whom is offering a sponge on a reed to Christ. In the background, a city with numerous towers and spires is depicted, set against a green landscape. The scene is framed by an illuminated border.
